name: Adamant Shield
notes:
Notes
It's TibiaLife's fansite item. When used, its color and light changes from Blue  to Purple  (and vice versa), as shown below, and it stays in the other color. It will also display one of its sounds.



Known receivers of this item: 

Makadamia, item creator.
Carol Witt, administrator of TibiaLife.
This item was awarded to five players during the Fansite Appreciation Day 2022. The winners were:

Sir Demoleide (Solidera)
Snaidell (Nefera)
Luiz Faixas (Havera)
Duchess Lara (Nefera)
Opio Sniezek (Celesta)

name: Amazon Shield
notes:
Notes
A rare sight on any world, since it only appears in the seldom orc raid on Femor Hills. On average, it is looted once every 10 years per game world if the special raid is killed 100% of the time. It has the same defence and weight as a Crown Shield. It is part of the Amazon Set.

name: Ancient Shield
notes:
Notes
A shield used once in the past by the now undead. It somewhat resembles to the Viking Shield which can be bought in Edron. A long time ago this shield was called Kaerell Shield and was given to Kaerell guild on Antica by the Gods same as Rose Shield and Mercenary Shield was. Kaerell is a word of the Breton language (spoken in Brittany / France), and it means weasel (the animal). It was drawn by the former leader of the Kaerell guild, Mantus.
Can be obtained by Unrusting a Slightly Rusted Shield.

name: Battle Shield
notes:
Notes
Rarely used as a shield due to its low defense and heavy weight. It is a good item for Loot Bags, as NPCs at shops buy them for a good price.

name: Biscuit Barrier
notes:
Notes
This object has no notes.

name: Black Shield
notes:
Notes
Often sold for a lower price on the Market. The Black Shield used to be quite rare, but became more common with recent updates.

name: Blessed Shield
notes:
Notes
This shield is arguably one of the best in Tibia. It has been gifted a few times by the Gods to those they deem worthy.
The first Blessed Shield in Tibia was a gift from the Gods to Elleshar, who sold it to Muesli. Lightbringer also owned a Blessed Shield briefly before selling it. This exceptional shield isn't normally obtainable in-game; as it is bestowed exclusively as a gift from the Gods. After years of uncertainty about its existence, the legendary shield resurfaced on Antica.

Owned by Lord Karr from May 18th, 2019 to June 15, 2022.

In the hands of Leif Loget Olsson.
 
In Gryphee's house together with a Ball Gown and a Bronze Necklace.

Hellgate Treasure Chamber

A really old pic - Lightbringer and his shield

name: Bone Shield
notes:
Notes
Used to be a rare shield on mainland. Often can be seen lying on the floor in Ankrahmun tombs and Mount Sternum. It is part of the Bone Set.

name: Bonelord Shield
notes:
Notes
This shield is quite rare, and sometimes more expensive than Dragon Shield, which is more common, However it is a good shield for mages because it is very light. It is part of the Bonelord Set.

name: Brass Shield
notes:
Notes
Third best shield in Rookgaard. Part of the Brass Set.

name: Broken Wooden Shield
notes:
Notes
This item is unobtainable. It was introduced in 10.55 with Dawnport, suggesting that it was intended to be given to aspiring Knights instead of the superior Wooden Shield they currently receive. The details of this item can be seen via the Market.

name: Carapace Shield
notes:
Notes
Since it has only one defense point more, but is more expensive and a lot heavier than the Demon Shield most Knights and Paladins opt to save up until they have enough money to buy a Mastermind Shield instead of using the Carapace Shield. Mages will simply stick to Demon Shield. It is most often only used as decoration.

name: Castle Shield
notes:
Notes
Mainly used for decoration. Collectors may pay highly for those shields.

name: Copper Shield
notes:
Notes
The best obtainable shield in Rookgaard. Due to a bug in Dawnport, the Steel Shield now exists in Rookgaard.
Obtainable from the Dragon Corpse Quest in Rookgaard.

name: Crown Shield
notes:
Notes
Better than Tower Shield because it weighs less. It is also part of the Crown Set.
Reward from the Black Knight Quest. Can be obtained by Unrusting a Slightly Rusted Shield.

name: Dark Shield
notes:
Notes
Used by most people when they come from Rookgaard because it's so easy to get. Used to be rare, until a quest to get it was implemented. Part of the Dark Set.
Looks the same as The Shield Nevermourn.
Reward from the Lighthouse Quest.

name: Death Gaze
notes:
Notes
This object has no notes.

name: Demon Shield
notes:
Notes
This is the eleventh best shield and the lightest shield in-game. Level 30-60 Sorcerers, Druids and Paladins usually use this shield because of its light weight, especially mages for their lack of capacity.
Obtainable in the Behemoth Quest and the Demon Helmet Quest.

name: Depth Scutum
notes:
Notes
The only shield that increases your magic level that has better defense than spellbooks. On the other hand, it does not list your available spells. Part of the Depth Set.

name: Dragon Shield
notes:
Notes
Common shield for players around level 25.
Can be traded for a Piece of Draconian Steel in The Sweaty Cyclops Quest which is used in the Hunter Outfits Quest and the Obsidian Knife Quest.

name: Dwarven Shield
notes:
Notes
This was a popular shield along low levels since it has a rather good defense and is relatively easy and affordable to obtain. Part of the Dwarven Set.
Obtainable through the Elvenbane Quest.

name: Eagle Shield
notes:
Notes
You can see it in Morguthis Treasure Room. Its data can be found on the Market.

name: Ectoplasmic Shield
notes:
Notes
This object has no notes.

name: Eerie Song Book
notes:
Notes
It looks the same as The Witches' Grimoire and an Unholy Book.
Obtained during Roshamuul Quest - Soothing Bad Dreams.

name: Eldritch Shield
notes:
Notes
It has Damage Reflection.

name: Falcon Escutcheon
notes:
Notes
It was once a Falcon Shield.
In order to create this item, you'll need the following items:

One  Falcon Shield, dropped by Grand Master Oberon.
One  Grant of Arms, dropped by Grand Master Oberon.
One  Patch of Fine Cloth, dropped by Falcon minibosses and obtainable from the Brass-Shod Chests in the Falcon Bastion.
Take the items to the forge inside the Falcon Bastion, here (you need to have advanced in The Secret Library Quest - The Order of the Falcon to enter this room), and then use the Falcon Shield on the Anvil. The Shield will be upgraded into the Escutcheon, the Patch of Fine Cloth will be consumed but you will keep the Grant of Arms.

name: Falcon Shield
notes:
Notes
It is possible to upgrade it to a Falcon Escutcheon with Grant of Arms‎ and a Patch of Fine Cloth in the Falcon Bastion's forge.

name: Fiery Rainbow Shield
notes:
Notes
To get this shield you need to use a Small Enchanted Ruby on a Rainbow Shield, enchanting it with fire. It increases your shielding skill by 3 for 15 minutes.

name: Gnome Shield
notes:
Notes
This object has no notes.

name: Golden Blessed Shield
notes:
Notes
This is one of the prizes for the characters ranked first in the Tournament Honour. The Gilded Blessed Shield looks the same and can be bought in the Store, which also means it cannot be traded with other players.

name: Gourd
notes:
Notes
It looks the same as a Rattling Gourd.
Part of the Krailos Quest.

name: Great Shield
notes:
Notes
It may be seen on Emperor Kruzak's Treasure Room, in Kazordoon, and also in the Maze of Lost Soul's treasure. It's part of the Full Set.

Maze of Lost Souls Treasure Room

name: Griffin Shield
notes:
Notes
It's kind of rare since it's not dropped by monsters. Looks good to decorate houses with.
Obtainable through the Griffin Shield Quest.

name: Guardian Shield
notes:
Notes
The Guardian Shield is a very good choice for low level characters of any vocation due to its affordable price and relatively high defence value. Recommended to anyone between the levels 10 and 50.

name: Haunted Mirror Piece
notes:
Notes
A very rare item indeed.    Haunted Mirror Piece on Inferna

name: Icy Rainbow Shield
notes:
Notes
To get this shield you need to use a Small Enchanted Sapphire on a Rainbow Shield, enchanting it with ice. Defense-wise, this is the second best shield in Tibia, with only one less defense point than the Blessed Shield. The enchantment lasts 15 minutes.

name: Journal Shield
notes:
Notes
It's the official BomDiaTibia's fansite item.
The following players have been awarded with a Journal Shield: 

Didi Hadid received one for designing the item in 2017.
Licad received one for getting first place in their Journal Shield na vida real contest in 2017.
In December 2018, BomDiaTibia held its "Best of the Year" contest. The following players were awarded a Journal Shield after popular vote:

Ferumbrinha Retro for being the "Best Youtuber".
Rubini for being the "Best Streamer".
Carl Kepler for being the administrator of the "Best Fansite" (TibiaWiki.com.br).
Lee kun for being the "Notable Player".
Maxigashi for being the "Best International Youtuber".
This item was awarded to four players during the Fansite Appreciation Day 2022. The winners were:

Fryns Winchester (Antica)
Lord Soyinho (Batabra)
Vinicius shocks (Pacera)
Sara Sedentaria (Zenobra)

name: Lion Shield
notes:
Notes
This object has no notes.

name: Mastermind Shield
notes:
Notes
This is the fifth best shield, third best in defense value, and is available on most worlds (Nightmare Shield and Necromancer Shield weigh less). It can be bought for a fairly cheap price since the 6666 Demon task introduction, which caused this shield to be looted more frequently, and may reach more than 100,000 on some servers. It is part of the Rare Set and is quoted in Legendary Curses IX.I (Book) and Legendary Curses IX.II (Book).

name: Mathmaster Shield (Replica)
notes:
Notes
This item is a replica of Mathmaster Shield.

name: Mathmaster Shield
notes:
Notes
It's the official TibiaStat item. It was created by Lupus Aurelius.
Its replica is the Mathmaster Shield (Replica).
When you use a mathmaster shield, it starts to shine and looks like this: 

Mathmaster Shield

name: Meat Shield
notes:
Notes
Use the dead body of Doctor Perhaps to have a chance of getting it. It is proof that you have slain him.
Looks the same as Ham. Beware of scams!
There is a chance of obtaining it in the Isle of Evil Quest.

name: Medusa Shield
notes:
Notes
A good shield for players level 30-50. A lot of people use a Crown Shield however, with the next step being a Vampire Shield or Demon Shield, because they're much lighter and not much more expensive.
Obtained in Medusa Shield Quest. Also needed for an addon of Wizard Outfits.

name: Mino Shield
notes:
Notes
Particularly useful to lower level knights as it offers the same defense as a Dragon Shield for just 5 oz. more. Therefore, the price of this shield largely depends on the value of Dragon Shields on your server.

name: Morshabaal's Mask

attributes.Attributes: fire magic level +1, ice magic level +1, earth magic level +1, energy magic level +1

notes:
Notes
This object has no notes.

name: Necromancer Shield
notes:
Notes
It is a rare item considering how difficult it is to obtain it. It provides a permanent green light when equipped. Since it has the same defense value as the Mastermind Shield, it is more often used for decoration.
Obtainable in the Dreamer's Challenge Quest after you give 1500 Demonic Essences (Brotherhood of Bones side).

name: Nightmare Shield
notes:
Notes
This shield was crafted by the mastery of the Nightmare Knights order. It is a rare item considering how difficult it is to obtain it. Provides a permanent red light if equipped. Since it has same defense value as the Mastermind Shield, it is more often used for decoration.
Obtainable in the Dreamer's Challenge Quest after you give 1500 Demonic Essences (Nightmare Knights side).

name: Norse Shield
notes:
Notes
An excellent choice for low levels, as its defense is the same as Bonelord Shield, but is significantly lighter. It's part of the Barbarian Set.
Can be obtained by Unrusting a Slightly Rusted Shield.

name: Ornamented Shield
notes:
Notes
Valued mostly as decoration for its beauty, this shield was one of the few remaining respawn quests. It is now in the same bag as the crystal key.
Obtainable from Ornamented Shield Quest.

name: Ornate Shield
notes:
Notes
At higher levels, this shield is better than the Prismatic Shield, since:

At higher levels, knights are more likely to have groups of monsters attacking them. Shielding can only block 2 monsters, so any more will not take advantage of the shielding bonus. The physical protection will still apply where the shielding does not.
Blood Rage makes a knight defenseless, which in turn makes shielding ineffective.
It has an imbuing slot.
Part of the Ornate Set.

name: Painted Gourd Rattle
notes:
Notes
It is meant to be used it for shamanic purposes.
Part of the Krailos Quest.

name: Phoenix Shield
notes:
Notes
This is the 8th best shield. Since it is rarely dropped by Mahrdis, Ferumbras, Furyosa and The Time Guardian, it is not an item that you see every day. Part of the Pharaoh Rares.

Pheonix Shield on Zanera.

name: Plate Shield
notes:
Notes
It's the second best shield in Rookgaard. It can be obtained by killing fierce Minotaurs. It is a common lootbag item, with a slightly worse gp/oz ratio than a Chain Armor.
Can be obtained by Unrusting a Slightly Rusted Shield.

name: Prismatic Shield
notes:
Notes
This shield is one of the best shields available in the game (it is the best for training and the second best for hunting). The Ornate Shield will block for more in most cases for level 150+ knights because:

At higher levels, knights are more likely to have groups of monsters attacking them. Shielding can only block 2 monsters, so any more will not take advantage of the shielding bonus. The physical protection will still apply where the shielding does not.
Blood Rage makes a knight defenseless, which in turn makes shielding ineffective.
Part of the Prismatic Set.

name: Rainbow Shield
notes:
Notes
The Rainbow Shield is enchantable in four unique ways, each granting special benefits for 15 minutes.
Obtainable through The Demon Oak Quest.




Gem
Product
Attributes


 Small Enchanted Amethyst
 Sparking Rainbow Shield
Increases your speed by 10 and gives 36 defense.


 Small Enchanted Emerald
 Terran Rainbow Shield
Regenerates 8 mana and 2 hitpoints every 6 seconds (300 hp and 1200 mana in total) and gives 37 defense.


 Small Enchanted Ruby
 Fiery Rainbow Shield
Increases your shielding skill by 3 and gives 36 defense.


 Small Enchanted Sapphire
 Icy Rainbow Shield
Gives you 39 defense.

name: Rattling Gourd
notes:
Notes
It's a rattling Gourd and looks the same as that one.
Part of the Krailos Quest.

name: Rift Shield
notes:
Notes
This object has no notes.

name: Rose Shield
notes:
Notes
This shield can only be found on Antica and seen inside Morguthis' Treasure Room.
Only 6 of these beautiful shields were ever made, they are owned by members of the guild Red Rose. This was a gift from CipSoft to them, for being one of the oldest guilds of Tibia.

Halfhigh's Rose ShieldA Rose Shield inside the Red Rose's Guildhall of the Red Rose, on Antica.

name: Runic Ice Shield
notes:
Notes
Used to be a very rare item as it was only dropped by the boss Hirintror. As of the 20th anniversary of Tibia, it is also dropped by Gelidrazah the Frozen.

name: Salamander Shield
notes:
Notes
Same defence as a Dwarven Shield, but far more rare. Makes a nice house decoration.

name: Scarab Shield
notes:
Notes
A semi-rare item. This shield can be seen on the counter near Omruc.

name: Sentinel Shield
notes:
Notes
Weak, but still considered rare.

name: Shield of Care
notes:
Notes
Use the dead body of Monstor to have a chance of getting it. It is proof that you have slain him.
Looks the same as a Heart Pillow.
There is a chance of obtaining it in the Isle of Evil Quest.

name: Shield of Corruption
notes:
Notes
An extremely rare shield, very hard to obtain. Since it's dropped by normal spawning creatures, its value will drop over time. It's an excellent choice for Knights using Sword Weapons. However, a Mastermind Shield is much cheaper and has 1 higher defense point (but lacks the Sword Fighting +3 and weighs 8 oz. more).
After the implementation of Imbuing with the Winter Update 2016, its price skyrocketed because this shield got 1 imbuing slot, making it more valuable.

name: Shield of Destiny (Activated)
notes:
Notes
This is one of two forms of the Shield of Destiny. It changes between forms when used. The creator of this shield is Lupus Aurelius.

name: Shield of Destiny
notes:
Notes
It's TibiaRoyal's fansite item and was designed by Lupus Aurelius. Use it to turn it into a Shield of Destiny (Activated).
Current owners of this item: 

Lupus Aurelius from Fortera. Item creator.
Eric from Hydera.
Honourable Knight of Honera from Honera.
Licad from Shivera.
Tio from Antica.
Thoror from Gladera.
Ice Crambler from Monza.
Snulliz from Monza.
Seanq from Monza.
Enenra from Monza.
Wielki Stachu from Relania.
Diex Torrid from Talera.
Soulfired from Antica.
Crowny Cro from Damora.

name: Shield of Endless Search
notes:
Notes
It's the official OrcSearch item.
Its replica is the Shield of Endless Search (Replica).

name: Shield of Honour
notes:
Notes
The Shield of Honour entered the game on January 7, 2002, as a gift for those who purchased a premium account of 7 months. This item was a special promotion for Tibia's 5th Anniversary and as a kick start to the introduction of premium accounts started only three months earlier. Due to its rarity, it has become a collector's item.
20 shields of honour were awarded on a Rhyme Contest during Tibia's 20th Anniversary celebrations. A shield of honour was awarded to Mytherin, in February 2017, for developing Tibialyzer.

Three Shields of Honour in a house on Antica

name: Shield of the White Knight
notes:
Notes
Use the dead body of Mephiles to have a chance of getting it. It is proof that you have slain him.
It looks the same as a White Knight Token.
There is a chance of obtaining it in the Isle of Evil Quest.

name: Silver Chimes
notes:
Notes
Temporarily obtained during The Secret Library Quest.

name: Soulbastion
notes:
Notes
Part of the Soul Set and one of the best Shields in the game.
It is a possible reward of the Soul War Quest, which guarantees one random item from the Soul Set the first time said quest is completed.
This item is not dropped by any creatures or bosses but it can be obtained from a Bag You Desire, which can be looted from any enemy or boss in the 5 areas of the Soul War Quest if some conditions are met.

name: Sparking Rainbow Shield
notes:
Notes
To get this shield you need to use a Small Enchanted Amethyst on a Rainbow Shield, enchanting it with energy. It increases your speed by 10 for 15 minutes.

name: Spike Shield
notes:
Notes
New item implemented in the Winter Update 2012. It has the same defense as the Bonelord Shield but it weighs more and usually costs less.

name: Steel Shield
notes:
Notes
It was once the best shield known, dropped back then by Daemon.This may be the first shield you get on Mainland, because you can buy it in a shop for a reasonable price. Knights can also get this shield in the Island of Destiny and in Dawnport. Due to a bug, the shield was also briefly brought to Rookgaard from Dawnport. 
Obtained in the Edron Goblin Quest.

name: Strange Good Night Songs
notes:
Notes
It looks the same as an Atlas, a Book (Atlas) and a Book (CGB).
Obtained during Roshamuul Quest - Soothing Bad Dreams.

name: Studded Shield
notes:
Notes
A good shield for early levels in Rookgaard. Also a Quest reward. Part of Studded Set.

name: Tempest Shield
notes:
Notes
One can be seen at Morguthis Treasure Room. It is now very expensive and rare due to the fact that the raids in which it was dropped have ended and it is now only dropped by some bosses.

Tempest Shield on Secura in 2007

name: Terran Rainbow Shield
notes:
Notes
To get this shield you need to use a Small Enchanted Emerald on a Rainbow Shield, enchanting it with earth. It speeds up your regeneration for 15 minutes (8 manapoints and 2 hitpoints every 6 seconds; 300 HP and 1200 MP in total).

name: The Shield Nevermourn
notes:
Notes
Use the dead body of Dirtbeard to have a chance of getting it. It is proof that you have slain him. It makes a sound when used, but it can only be used every 5 minutes. The orange text can only be seen by the player using the shield. The customer and bank teller joke is rarer than the others, it has the chance of around 1% of appearing. It looks the same as a Dark Shield.
There is a chance of obtaining it in the Isle of Evil Quest.

name: Tortoise Shield
notes:
Notes
Quite common as a lot of knights have backpacks of them from hunting Tortoises. It can be sold to low level players because it has the same defense as a Dwarven Shield, but is 3 oz. lighter.

name: Tower Shield
notes:
Notes
A good shield for low/mid levels, though its high weight compared to defense value lowers its value somewhat. The next step up would be a Crown Shield or a Medusa Shield.
Obtainable through the Deeper Fibula Quest and The Queen of the Banshees Quest.

name: Traditional Stein
notes:
Notes
Part of the Traditional Set.
Obtained by facing the Orger Treasure for the first time in your fourth edition of Orcsoberfest.

name: Tusk Shield
notes:
Notes
A rare shield from Elephants and Mammoths.
Can be obtained from Shaggy Ogre Bags.

name: Vampire Shield
notes:
Notes
This is a very rare item considering the effort needed to obtain one.
Good upgrade from the Crown Shield, if you can't afford a Demon Shield.
Obtainable through the Vampire Shield Quest and Unrusting a Slightly Rusted Shield.

name: Viking Shield
notes:
Notes
Rarely used, since there are better and more common shields available such as Dwarven Shield. Also a part of the Viking Set.

name: Warrior's Shield
notes:
Notes
Part of the Warrior's Set. Similar to a Medusa Shield, albeit slightly heavier.

name: Wooden Shield
notes:
Notes
The first shield you may find in tibia, as well as being the weakest shield. Common lootbag item for lower levels.
